summary: A mysterious love triangle leads to a tragic shooting. Months later, eight members of a MySpace-esque chat room are being gruesomely murdered in the privacy of their own homes.
cast: Gabrielle Anwar|William Forsythe|Tony Todd|Frank Grillo|Terri Conn|Wilson Jermaine Heredia|Charles Durning|Billy Dee Williams|Margaret Colin|Justin Deas|Joanne Baron|Brooke Lewis Bellas|Miranda Kwok|Christie Botelho|Donna Bostany|Drea Castro|Barbara Christie|Arthur Colombino|Jane Dashow|Antares Davis|Jennifer Estlin|Andrew Goffman|Philip Greene|Ashley Greenfield|Dan Grimaldi|Brett Howell|Shannon Ivey|Rodney Laney|Kristen Lowman|Tim Miller|Jack Mulcahy|Christie Napurano|Jeff Quinlan|Erika Smith|Josh Turi|Zander Villayne|Maria Diaz|Don Gomez|Keith Krebs|Wendy Marquez|Lauren Quirk|Raelene Roberts|Chris Rowan|Julia Sun
title: iMurders
